name: Enhanced Persian Twitter
description:
A visual enhancement for Twitter, focusing on the content. With additional featuresfor Persian users, e.g. using "Iranian Sans" as main font for tweets and "Droid Arabic Naskh" for links, buttons and other texts, plus realigning some objects to make a better feeling in Persian Twitter.
It also can be used in English Twitter for better Persian support.
additional_info:
* Persian Twitter user style
* Version : 4.5
* Author : Danial Behzadi (@danialbehzadi)
* Updated : Jan 5, 2018
* Website : https://gnu.rocks
* Description : Twitter clear style suitable for Persian users.
* License : CC BY-SA v4 or higher
* Style page: http://userstyles.org/styles/90295/enhanced-persian-twitter

Please note that you should have the fonts named above ("Iranian Sans" and "Droid Arabic Naskh") installed on your system before you can use this style!

To access older versions, file a bug, suggest a feature or ask a question, visit this projects repository here: https://launchpad.net/ept
